metadata.note: Formation tops from published literature and well completion reports. Verify against log signatures.

Chad_Fm.log_character: Low GR (<60 API), low resistivity, fresh water

Fika_Shale.lithology: Dark grey marine shale with minor limestone
Fika_Shale.log_character: High GR (>100 API), low resistivity, high density

Bima_Sst.log_character: Low GR (<60 API), high resistivity if HC present

BULTE-1.source: NNPC Well Completion Report / Log Interpretation
BULTE-1.picking_notes: Good log quality. Clear Fika Shale at 720m marked by GR increase to 120 API.

HERWA-01.picking_notes: Excellent log quality. Thick Fika section. Bima shows good sand development.

MASU-1.picking_notes: Deep well. Started below Chad Fm. Logs start at 2025m. Very thick Bima section.

KASADE-01.picking_notes: Moderate log quality. Picks based on regional correlation with BULTE-1.

NGAMMAEAST-1.picking_notes: Deep well with complete section. Thick Gongila development.

NGORNORTH-1.picking_notes: Shallow well. Thin section. Chad Fm thicker than average.
